qas.question: What ws the final day of the 19th Party Conference?
What did Gorbachev hope to create?
What was Gorbachev trying to separate?
What was the proposed legislative body called?
What was the ideology of Gorbachev's opponents?

context: On <a0_0>July 1, 1988<a0_0/>, the fourth and last day of a bruising 19th Party Conference, Gorbachev won the backing of the tired delegates for his last-minute proposal to create a <a1_0>new supreme legislative body<a1_0/> called the Congress of People's Deputies. Frustrated by the old guard's resistance, Gorbachev embarked on a set of constitutional changes to try to separate <a2_0>party and state<a2_0/>, and thereby isolate his <a4_0>conservative<a4_0/> Party opponents. Detailed proposals for the new <a3_0>Congress of People's Deputies<a3_0/> were published on October 2, 1988, and to enable the creation of the new legislature the Supreme Soviet, during its November 29–December 1, 1988, session, implemented amendments to the 1977 Soviet Constitution, enacted a law on electoral reform, and set the date of the election for March 26, 1989.
